( #{item.templateId}, #{item.pid}, #{item.componentId}, #{item.name}, #{item.introduction}, #{item.required}, #{item.sequence}, #{item.type}, #{item.dataOrigin}, #{item.originIdentify}, #{item.fieldFlag} )
mapper.select: SELECT t.id, t.pid, t.component_id as componentId, t.template_id as templateId, t.name, t.introduction, t.is_required as required, t.type, t.data_origin as dataOrigin, t.origin_identify as originIdentify, t.field_flag as fieldFlag, t1.code FROM t_template_component t INNER JOIN t_component t1 ON t.component_id = t1.id where t.template_id = #{templateId} and t.is_deleted = 0 ORDER BY t.sequence
